label: specifiedExperienceEvent
comment: An event for this specified experience item.

rangeIncludes.comment: An involvement in an experience program in which some thing happens, such as a nature watching, woodware manufacturing, meditation, holiday trip, dinner, theme park visit, could be experienced.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of information specific to the involvement of a person or persons in a happening, such as a theme park, a guided tour being used or reported on for trade purposes.
